params.text: Ekinyonyi kisobola okubuuka. Enkazaluggya esobola okubuuka.
Embalaasi tesobola kubuuka.
Ensowera esobola okubuuka . Sikada esobola okubuuka.
Omunya tegusobola kubuuka.
Ekiwuggulu kisobola okubuuka. Pelican esobola okubuuka.
Giboni tezisobola kubuuka.
Ennyonyi enyange zisobola okubuuka. Hornbill zisobola okubuuka.
Empologoma tesobola kubuuka.
Ebiwuggulu ebyakitaka omutangaavu bisobola okubuuka. Ensiri zisobola okubuuka.
Endiga tezisobola kubuuka.
Olunaku lumu tujja kubuuka.
Nange njagala kubuuka.

"Ka tubuuke" credits

This work, "Ka tubuuke, is a derivative of "Let's Fly!" by All Children Reading Cambodia. © The Asia Foundation , 2018 and used under CC BY. "Ka tubuuke" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
